info.name: Indian Trade Mart - Complete API Collection
info.description: Comprehensive API documentation for the Indian Trade Mart B2B marketplace backend system

folders.name: Authentication
folders.description: User registration, login, and authentication endpoints

requests.name: Data Entry Registration
requests.description: Register a new data entry account

requests.name: Data Entry Login
requests.description: Data Entry-specific login with role validation

requests.name: Verify OTP
requests.description: Verify OTP and get JWT token

requests.name: Forgot Password
requests.description: Send password reset OTP to email

requests.name: Get User Count by Role
requests.description: Get user count by specific role

requests.name: Check if Email Exists
requests.description: Check if email exists in system

requests.name: Check if Phone Exists
requests.description: Check if phone number exists in system

requests.name: Authenticate Buyer
requests.description: Authenticate buyer with email and password

requests.name: Generate Password Reset Token
requests.description: Generate password reset token for buyer

requests.name: Send Phone Verification
requests.description: Send phone verification OTP for buyer

requests.name: Get All Buyers
requests.description: Get paginated list of all buyers

requests.name: Search Buyers
requests.description: Search buyers by name, email, or business name

requests.name: Get Buyers by Company
requests.description: Get buyers associated with a company

requests.name: Get Buyer Count by Status
requests.description: Get buyer count grouped by status

requests.name: Get Buyer Count by Type
requests.description: Get buyer count grouped by type

requests.name: Get Buyer Count by Verification Status
requests.description: Get buyer count grouped by verification status

requests.name: Get Buyer Count by State
requests.description: Get buyer count grouped by state

requests.name: Get Buyer Registration Stats
requests.description: Get buyer registration statistics for date range

requests.name: Get High Value Buyers
requests.description: Get high value buyers based on order value

requests.name: Get Frequent Buyers
requests.description: Get frequent buyers based on order count

requests.name: Get Inactive Buyers for Re-engagement
requests.description: Get inactive buyers for re-engagement campaigns

requests.name: Get Buyers Eligible for Premium Offers
requests.description: Get buyers eligible for premium offers

requests.name: Get Buyers with Pending KYC
requests.description: Get buyers with pending KYC verification

requests.name: Check Email Availability
requests.description: Check if email is available for registration

requests.name: Check Phone Availability
requests.description: Check if phone number is available for registration

requests.name: Check Feature Eligibility
requests.description: Check if buyer is eligible for specific feature

requests.name: Export Buyers
requests.description: Export buyer data in specified format

body.raw:
{
  "vendorName": "ABC Electronics",
  "businessName": "ABC Electronics Pvt Ltd",
  "email": "vendor@abcelectronics.com",
  "phone": "+919876543210",
  "businessType": "MANUFACTURER",
  "businessCategory": "ELECTRONICS",
  "establishedYear": 2015,
  "description": "Leading electronics manufacturer"
}

requests.name: Get All Vendors
requests.description: Get paginated list of all vendors

requests.name: Search Vendors
requests.description: Search vendors by name or business name

requests.name: Get Pending KYC Vendors
requests.description: Get vendors with pending KYC verification

requests.name: Get Vendors by Orders
requests.description: Get vendors with minimum order count

requests.name: Check Email Uniqueness
requests.description: Check if email is unique for vendor registration

requests.name: Check Phone Uniqueness
requests.description: Check if phone number is unique for vendor registration

requests.name: Check Company Linkage
requests.description: Check if company is already linked to a vendor

requests.name: Authenticate Vendor
requests.description: Authenticate vendor with email and password
